scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Manuscript of official report of the verbal proceedings of the Classe des Scienceae, Physiques, et Math‚matiques, Institut de France, 31 August 1812, presenting the findings of [Claude] Berthollet, Jauquelin, and Chenard, regarding Cluzel's work with "liquid sulfur." Findings approved and adopted by the Classe des Scienceae, and document signed: "Certifi‚ conforme … l'original, le Secretaire perp‚tuel, Chevalier de l'Empire, G[eorges] Cuvier." Document issued on printed letterhead, with engraved emblem. No Crerar accession number. University of Chicago accession number 92-39.
